actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the protection of Palmer's Chapel within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to take such measures as may be necessary to provide for the protection of Palmer's Chapel in the Chataloochee Valley of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Tennessee.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the protection of Palmer's Chapel within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.
